summary: Prince Leopold, heir to the throne of Cordinia, wishes to marry his young love Emily Taylor, a humble seamstress from Philadelphia. But Leopold's mother, Queen Isadora has other plans for her son.
cast: Lacey Chabert|Stephen Hagan|Jane Seymour|Katherine Flynn|Simon Dutton|Mitchell Mullen|Katrina Nare|Diana Dumitrescu|Vlad Ianus|Kate Loustau|Ionut Grama|Alice O'Mahoney|Anne Gould|Mihai Niculescu|Olivia Krevoy|James 'Poorman' Trenton|Cosmin Guzan|Viorel Androne|Ionut Avram|Andra Gagila|Laura Paraschiv|Dominic Valcu|Elena Blaj|Cristina Buscan|Vasile Chiriac|Gheorghita Petrache|Ionut Stafie|Georgeta Zanfir|Adina Rapiteanu|Natalie von Rotsburg|Dashell Zamm
